context.fastmatterAttributes: {"id":"5f99a7","name":"`aria-*` attribute is defined in WAI-ARIA","rule_type":"atomic","description":"This rule checks that each `aria-` attribute specified is defined in ARIA 1.1.\n","accessibility_requirements":null,"input_aspects":["DOM Tree"],"acknowledgements":{"authors":["Jey Nandakumar"]}}
